name: @Muhammadfaizanjanjua109/ai-visibility
description: Make your web app citable by AI models. Automatic schema, bot optimization, and AI readiness scoring for Node.js apps.

scripts.build:shebang: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const cliPath = path.join('dist', 'cli', 'index.js'); let content = fs.readFileSync(cliPath, 'utf8'); if (!content.startsWith('#!/usr/bin/env node')) { content = '#!/usr/bin/env node\n' + content.replace(/^#!.*\n/, ''); fs.writeFileSync(cliPath, content); }"
scripts.check: npm run typecheck && npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build
scripts.ready-to-publish: npm run check && echo '✅ All checks passed! Safe to publish.' && echo 'Run: npm run publish:both'
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && npm run test
scripts.publish:both: npm run check && npm version patch && npm publish --registry https://registry.npmjs.org/ && npm publish --registry https://npm.pkg.github.com && echo '✅ Published to npm and GitHub Packages!'
scripts.release: npm run ready-to-publish && npm run publish:both

author: Muhammad Faizan <muhammadfaizanjanjua109@gmail.com>
